Content.notes: Fiona Foster grew up in the Ottawa Valley and has been living in MontrÃÂ©al for two years, where she enjoys badminton, science movies, and Richard Cassidy. Fiona is a frequent book reviewer for the Globe and Mail, and has worked as a literary editor, a portrait artist and a civil servant.
